Text: still the scariest game ive played. more than even amnesia.
The installation isn't in English and my computer doesn't even have the font package it needs. I'll post whether everything else worked alright for the actual game in just a bit.

OK the good news is: the game itself is in English. The bad news is: the game kept crashing on the title screen as I was changing settings. I'm sure it has to do with the firewall or something though. But, other than that, the graphics are gorgeous, runs smooth and is pre-cracked. Enjoy!

A bit annoying that the installation isn't in English but you can guess where to click so it's not really a problem. The game is running fine, mine isn't crashing, and it's already cracked. About Doom 1 and 2 I was hoping that this would be new HD versions but these are the original ones. Still fun but graphics are of course completely outdated.
Thanks.
